text: Popchips are so much better than, say, potato chips with about 1/10th the calories and fat.  I have tried the variety case and absolutely love all the flavors.  Instead of chips and dip, I now have popchips plain or with fat-free dip or salsa and still loose weight eating something that I truly enjoy!!!  Popchips are the best tasting 120 calorie snack on the market.  It truly does replace your craving for salty, high fat potato chips, doritos, fritos, etc.  You may be amazed when you try these popchips!!
